Title: Relates to prohibiting the use of the onset of menarche to determine a student's physical maturity for the purpose of permitting such student to participate in athletic activities
Summary: Prohibits the use of the onset of menarche to determine a student's physical maturity for the purpose of permitting such student to participate in athletic activities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the use of the onset of menarche to determine a student's physical maturity for the purpose of permitting such student to participate in athletic activities
